Kitsuno wrote:

> You know what they gotta do to bump up the ratings, and this would 
> work for any story, is throw in some dark-skinned, kinpatsu 
> joushikousei with that Tokyo valley-girl Japanese as concubines and 
> let SMAP break into song during combat just like West Side Story.  
> Have Akashiya Sanma be the main antagonist, with Matsumoto Hitoshi as 
> the head of the heroic clan and mentor of his SMAP hiers.  Let 
> Quentin Tarrantino write the screenplay, and have David Lynch co-
> direct with Takashi Miike. And make sure KimuTaku dies a horrible 
> death at the hands of Beat Takeshi.  I'd pay to watch that.

Heck, so would I. Hm. The new wave in Japanese pay-per-view. <G>


Tony
